T02D2676:137b-1: a'ar+ya n'i l'a m'a ra dha ra badzra p'a ni dh'a ra n'i bi bri tti n'a ma /
T02D2676:137b-3: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi gzungs kyi 'grel ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2676:137b-4: dpal zhe sdang rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo /
T02D2676:138a-1: pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog / phyag na rdo rje la btud nas //
T02D2676:138a-3: las kyi rdo rje bdag gis brtsam //
T02D2676:138a-8: dgos pa'i dgos pa mod la gsungs te /
T02D2676:138a-9: 'dir bshad par bya ba yin te /
T02D2676:138a-10: gang gi phyir brjod pa la sogs pa ma rtogs
T02D2676:138a-11: par nyan pa po rnams ni 'jug par mi 'gyur
T02D2676:138a-12: bas / de'i phyir gos sngon po zhes bya ba'i
T02D2676:138a-13: lag na rdo rje'i gzungs zhes bya ba ni rjod
T02D2676:138a-14: bas / par byed pa'o // 'phags pa lag na
T02D2676:138a-15: rdo rje'i gzungs dang stobs dang mthu la sogs pa
T02D2676:138a-16: gzungs kyi sgo nas bstan pa ni brjod par bya
T02D2676:138a-17: bas / par byed pa'o // ba'o // de dag gis phan tshun 'brel ba yin te /
T02D2676:138a-19: brjod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2676:138a-20: sems can thams cad la dug dang /
T02D2676:138a-23: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis rgyas btab dang /
T02D2676:138a-25: brjed byed la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa nges par bzlog pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D2676:138a-26: de dag kyang tshe ring ba dang nad med pa
T02D2676:138a-27: la sogs pa thob na 'phags pa phyag na rdo
T02D2676:138a-28: rje'i mthu 'di yin no zhes nges par 'dzin pas
T02D2676:138a-29: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la nye bar 'jug
T02D2676:138a-30: cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur zhing /
T02D2676:138a-32: de yang rigs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams la brten te bshad par bya'o //
T02D2676:138a-33: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyis gang gi
T02D2676:138a-34: tshe 'dri bar gyur na 'di gang zag gis brtsams
T02D2676:138a-35: zhes de'i tshe chos ston pa la sogs phun sum
T02D2676:138a-36: tshogs pa mdo sde'i rjes su 'brangs nas bshad par
T02D2676:138a-37: bya'o // de la dze ta'i tshal du mgon med
T02D2676:138a-38: zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na zhes bya bas
T02D2676:138a-39: gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2676:138a-40: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bas ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2676:138a-41: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya bas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa /
T02D2676:138a-42: gzungs gsungs pa ni bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2676:138a-43: dus gcig na zhes pas dus phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T02D2676:138a-44: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde
T02D2676:138a-45: dpon chen po zhes bya bas drag po chen po
T02D2676:138b-0: 'dul bar @138b byed pa bstan pa yin te /
T02D2676:138b-1: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang gi rang bzhin can no //
T02D2676:138b-2: de rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni gtso bo zhe
T02D2676:138b-3: sdang gi rigs las 'byung ba'i sprul pa'i sku zhal
T02D2676:138b-4: rnam par 'gyur ba bstan pa ni gdug pa 'dul
T02D2676:138b-5: ba 'dzin pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D2676:138b-6: de bas na phyag na rdo rje zhes smos pa
T02D2676:138b-7: ni rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i rdo rje mtshan
T02D2676:138b-8: ma 'dzin pa'o // gos sngon po can zhes bya
T02D2676:138b-9: bas sprin sngo po dang 'dra ba'i na bza' bsnams
T02D2676:138b-10: pas 'di ni sngon ma mthong ba'i klu yin zhes
T02D2676:138b-11: klu'i rgyal po rnams grags pa 'jig pa'i don to
T02D2676:138b-12: ma 'dzin pa'o // // sangs rgyas gang g'a'i klung
T02D2676:138b-13: gi bye ma snyed kyis gnang ba zhes bya bas
T02D2676:138b-14: ma 'dzin pa'o // // ni / phyag na rdo
T02D2676:138b-15: rje nyid la dbang bskur ba thob pa bstan te
T02D2676:138b-17: phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya
T02D2676:138b-18: ngan las 'das pa na phyag na rdo rje nyid
T02D2676:138b-19: la gnang ba zhes bya ba ni bstan pa gtad
T02D2676:138b-21: mche ba gtsigs pa zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i
T02D2676:138b-22: dug can klu rnams rnam par 'joms pa'i dam tshig
T02D2676:138b-24: bstan to // mig me ma dag gi phung po
T02D2676:138b-25: 'dra ba zhes bya bas yang dag pa'i ye shes
T02D2676:138b-26: kyi me dpung dang mtshungs pa'i spyan gyi sa khams
T02D2676:138b-27: gsum pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyin ci log pa'i
T02D2676:138b-28: lta ba sreg par byed pa'i sgo nas lta ba'i
T02D2676:138b-29: dug can gyi klu rnams 'joms pa'i dam tshig bstan
T02D2676:138b-31: bstan to // to // dbugs me lce ltar 'bar
T02D2676:138b-32: ba zhes bya bas srog gi dbugs kyi klu dag
T02D2676:138b-33: bdag gi dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2676:138b-35: bstan to // to // brten te / me'i phung
T02D2676:138b-36: po dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis dbang du
T02D2676:138b-38: rtsol ba'i rlung rnams kyis kyang gdug pa'i sems can
T02D2676:138b-39: thams cad 'gugs par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to
T02D2676:138b-40: // 'jigs pa'i nga ro can zhes bya ba ni
T02D2676:138b-41: ro langs skrag par byed pa'i dam tshig gis klu
T02D2676:138b-42: rnams kyi 'brug sgra'i rjes su byed pa'i dgongs pas
T02D2676:138b-43: 'jigs pa skyed par mdzad ces pa'i don to //
T02D2676:138b-44: lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus
T02D2676:138b-45: brgyan pa zhes bya bas nor rgyas kyi bu sngags
T02D2676:138b-46: kyis bkug nas dug phrogs nas phyag dang zhabs kyi
T02D2676:138b-47: rgyan nyid du mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2676:138b-48: klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2676:139a-1: dug 'phro bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag sprul nag po ste grib ma dug can no //
T02D2676:139a-2: de se ral kha zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa
T02D2676:139a-3: nyid la gnas pa'i rtags su gyur pa tshangs skud
T02D2676:139a-4: thogs shing brgyan pas grib ma'i dug can gyi klu
T02D2676:139a-5: rnams 'dul bar byed par bstan to //
T02D2676:139a-6: klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2676:139a-7: dug gi kha phru 'bar ba rnams kyis sems can
T02D2676:139a-8: la gnod pa byed pa dga' bo dang nye dga'
T02D2676:139a-10: sangs rgyas la dad cing zhi bar gyur pa tshig
T02D2676:139a-11: snyan pas phyag na rdo rje la bstod cing thal
T02D2676:139a-12: mo sbyar te snyan par gyur pas de'i phyir 'phags
T02D2676:139a-13: pa phyag na rdo rje'i snyan gyi rgyan nyid du
T02D2676:139a-15: sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan
T02D2676:139a-16: thogs pa zhes bya ba ni rang 'byung de bzhin
T02D2676:139a-17: gshegs pa'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan la bcings pa'i
T02D2676:139a-18: gdug pas rab tu 'bar ba'i sbrul gyi gdengs ka'i
T02D2676:139a-19: phreng bas nye bar mdzes pa'i dbu rgyan thogs par
T02D2676:139a-20: bstan to // sbrul gdug pa bar ba za ba
T02D2676:139a-21: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnyis su
T02D2676:139a-22: med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas
T02D2676:139a-23: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid dran pa'i dug can
T02D2676:139a-24: gyi sprul za bar byed pa ltar gdul bya rnams
T02D2676:139a-26: bzhin rgyas pa zhes bya bas ni shin tu rgyas
T02D2676:139a-27: pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bstan pas
T02D2676:139a-28: sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi
T02D2676:139a-29: rgyal po rnams kyang 'dul bar mdzad ces bya bar
T02D2676:139a-30: dgongs so // smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa
T02D2676:139a-31: zhes bya bas ni smin ma'i lcang lo 'degs pas
T02D2676:139a-32: dpral ba bsdus pa nyid kyis ma rungs pa'i nga
T02D2676:139a-36: mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad bsdigs par mdzad ces bstan to //
T02D2676:139a-37: de bas na ya sos ma mchu mnan pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2676:139a-38: sems can thams cad la thogs pa med pa nas
T02D2676:139a-39: dgra ru gyur pa'i phung po'i bdud la sogs pa
T02D2676:139a-40: tshar gcod par dam bcas pa la dran pa'i brda'i
T02D2676:139a-41: mtshan nyid kyi khro bo'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya'i mtshan
T02D2676:139b-0: nyid bstan to // gshin rje'i cha byad can zhes bya ba ni sku @139b mdog gnag pa /
T02D2676:139b-3: lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02D2676:139b-4: mi yi rgyu ma'i phreng ba do shal du 'phyang zhing ma he la zhon pa /
T02D2676:139b-5: lha mo nag mos mgul par 'khyud pa skad cig gis kyang snang bar gyur to //
T02D2676:139b-6: lce glog ltar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la glog ni klu'i lce'o ;
T02D2676:139b-7: / de bas kyang lhag par rno zhing 'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa /
T02D2676:139b-8: de bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang
T02D2676:139b-9: du bskul bas 'jigs par byed pa'i lce bar bas
T02D2676:139b-10: glog ces bya bas klu'i lce 'joms pas sems can
T02D2676:139b-11: thams cad la thog la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa med
T02D2676:139b-12: par byed do // gsus po che sbrul za ba zhes bya ba la /
T02D2676:139b-13: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i sku'i che ba bstan
T02D2676:139b-14: par bya ba'i phyir de la gsus po che zhes
T02D2676:139b-15: bya bas log 'dren glang po che'i mgo can gsus
T02D2676:139b-16: po ches 'dul bar mdzad ces bstan to //
T02D2676:139b-17: sprul za ba zhes bya bas nam mkha' lding gi rtog pa rab tu 'joms pa bstan to //
T02D2676:139b-18: lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2676:139b-19: shin tu thugs rje'i khro bos dkrugs pa'i dbang gis
T02D2676:139b-20: phyag brdabs pa las byung ba'i sgra'i 'jigs pas khyab
T02D2676:139b-21: 'jug dang / ma h'a de ba dang /
T02D2676:139b-22: tshangs pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das gos sngon
T02D2676:139b-23: po can phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su song
T02D2676:139b-24: ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2676:139b-25: klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs ske rags su bcings pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2676:139b-26: sngon gang gi tshe sa 'og gi rim pa bdun
T02D2676:139b-27: la bris pa'i 'dab bzangs nam mkha'i lding gis 'dren
T02D2676:139b-28: pa 'khyil pa bdun las 'khril ba phyed dang gnyis
T02D2676:139b-29: ri rab kyi rtse mor slebs pa 'khyil pa phyed
T02D2676:139b-30: dang drug sa'i 'og tu lus pas de'i tshe klu
T02D2676:139b-31: de nam mkha' lding gis za bar ma nus so
T02D2676:139b-32: // de lta bur gyur pa'i 'dab bzangs kyang 'phags
T02D2676:139b-33: pa phyag na rdo rjes thogs pa med par rdzu
T02D2676:139b-34: 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ska rags su bcings pa na
T02D2676:139b-35: khris gcig las ma byung zhes sku bong gi tshad
T02D2676:139b-36: // bstan to // aa la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2676:139b-37: aa la la'i sgra ni ro langs sgrog par byed pa'i dam tshig go //
T02D2676:140a-0: kye ro langs dang mkha' 'gro ma drag mo rnams bdag bzhengs bar @140a * //
T02D2676:140a-1: gyur nas khyed cag gis ci zhig nus zhes sgrogs
T02D2676:140a-2: shing 'jigs pa skyed par byed ces bya ba'i don
T02D2676:140a-3: to // rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshang brgyad khri
T02D2676:140a-4: bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i bus mor phyin pa
T02D2676:140a-5: zhes bya ba 'dis sa dang sa 'og dang sa
T02D2676:140a-6: blang khyab par byed pa'i sku bstan pa'o /
T02D2676:140a-7: de bzhin du yang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cus
T02D2676:140a-8: bus mo ring ba'i tshad kyis sku stod kyi tshad
T02D2676:140a-9: dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis su shes par bya'o //
T02D2676:140a-10: de bas na dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2676:140a-11: ri rab kyi rtse mo las kyang sku bong steng
T02D2676:140a-12: du 'phags pas brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha rnams
T02D2676:140a-14: klu thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba
T02D2676:140a-15: la klu rnams kyi mgrin pa na gnas pa'i gdug
T02D2676:140a-16: pa sngags kyis 'phrog par mdzad nas /
T02D2676:140a-17: de rnams kyi sems kyi gdug pa rnam par 'joms shing gsod par mdzad ces dgongs so //
T02D2676:140a-18: gad rgyangs chen po dgod pas 'khrug par byed pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2676:140a-19: ha ha dgong pa'i dam tshig la gnas pa'i phyi'i
T02D2676:140a-20: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi snying kun dkrugs nas 'dul bar
T02D2676:140a-22: gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2676:140a-23: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
T02D2676:140a-24: snying rdo rje chen po'i rang bzhin can yin yang
T02D2676:140a-25: khams gsum pa'i sems can rnams kyis gshin rje'i gzugs
T02D2676:140a-26: su mthong nas shin tu 'jigs pa'i don gyis skyabs
T02D2676:140a-27: su song zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2676:140a-28: de bas na de rnams kyi ji ltar 'dud pa byed do //
T02D2676:140a-29: klu rnams 'chi bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2676:140a-30: 'chi bar byed pa ni 'dul bar byed pa'i don to //
T02D2676:140a-31: de bas na lha dang mi thams cad kyis bcom
T02D2676:140a-32: ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la mchod pa dang
T02D2676:140a-33: / bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas phyag byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2676:140a-34: de ltar 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs dang stobs dang che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D2676:140a-35: da ni slar yang zhes bya ba ni phyag na
T02D2676:140a-36: rdo rje'i rig sngags kyi bsngags pa ston par byed
T02D2676:140a-37: de / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+ga'i klung gi
T02D2676:140b-0: bye ma snyed kyis gsungs @140b pa'i rig sngags 'di
T02D2676:140b-1: brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
T02D2676:140b-2: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /
T02D2676:140b-4: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i rig sngags 'di nyid mchog yin pas /
T02D2676:140b-5: kye skyes bu sgrub pa po rnams khyed cag gis kyang 'di brjod par bya ba yin zhes so //
T02D2676:140b-6: sdud pa po'i gdams ngag gi rig sngags de gang zhe na /
T02D2676:140b-8: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags ston par byed do //
T02D2676:140b-9: bho bho b'an n'a ga aa dhi pa ta ye shes bya ba la /
T02D2676:140b-11: aa dhi pa ta ye shes bya ba ni lhag par bdag po ste klu rgyal brgyad do //
T02D2676:140b-12: bho bho zhes bya ba ni kye kye ste de rnams la bod pa ste /
T02D2676:140b-13: ai dan zhes bya ba ni 'di ste 'bod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2676:140b-15: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra sha r'i ram zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2676:140b-16: gos sngon po can gyi sku'o //
T02D2676:140b-17: gang gi phyir sku ma rtogs par sngags 'byung ba
T02D2676:140b-18: mi srid par sngags dang sku gnyis su med par
T02D2676:140b-19: bstan pa'o // badzra p'a ni hri da yam zhes bya ba las /
T02D2676:140b-20: phyag na rdo rje'i snying po ste gos sngon po can gyi kho na'o //
T02D2676:140b-21: snying po zhes bya ba ni gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir dag gi brjod pa gsungs pa /
T02D2676:140b-22: bsgrub bya mngon du byed nus pa rgyu de'i phyir
T02D2676:140b-23: ya:sa m'a ti kr'a ma ti zhes bya ba smos
T02D2676:140b-24: pa la sgrub pa po gang gis 'dor zhing 'da'
T02D2676:140b-25: bar byed na 'dug pa'i sems can de autsh'a da
T02D2676:140b-26: nam bha bi shya ni zhes bya ba ni yul
T02D2676:140b-27: nas gzhan gyis bskrad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2676:140b-28: snying po de gang zhe na /
T02D2676:140b-29: datya th'a zhes bya ba smos te 'di lta ste
T02D2676:140b-30: zhes bya bas snying po mngon par byed de buddha
T02D2676:140b-31: buddha bi budha zhes bya ba phyag na rdo rje
T02D2676:140b-32: la bod pa'o // ma h'i prapta zhes bya ba ni ma 'gor cig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2676:140b-33: gdug pa 'joms pa la myur du rem zhig ces bya ba tshig lhag ma dang sbyar ro //
T02D2676:140b-34: ha ra ha ra zhes bya ba ni gdug pa
T02D2676:140b-35: rnams kyi stobs la sogs pa phrogs shing phrogs shing
T02D2676:140b-37: gdug pa de gang zhe na /
T02D2676:140b-38: n'a g'a n'am zhes bya ba smos te klu rnams kyi tshig gis tshig 'brel pa'o //
T02D2676:140b-39: pra ha ra pra ha ra zhes bya ba ni
T02D2676:140b-40: 'ong zer las byung ba khro bo rnams kyis rgyob
T02D2676:140b-43: n'a g'a n'am zhes bya ba smos te klu rnams kyi stobs dang /
T02D2676:141a-1: pa brlag par gyis shig ces bya bar dgongs so //
T02D2676:141a-2: tstshinda tstshinda zhes bya ba ni ral gris chod cig chod cig pa'o //
T02D2676:141a-3: gcad par bya ba gang zhe na /
T02D2676:141a-4: n'a ga hri da y'a ni zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2676:141a-6: bhinda bhinda zhes bya ba ni choms shig choms shig pa'o//
T02D2676:141a-8: n'a ga da ma ni zhes bya ba ni klu
T02D2676:141a-9: dang klu mo bcings pa'i tshogs kyis 'khyil pa rnams
T02D2676:141a-11: n'a ga da ma ni zhes bya ba la /
T02D2676:141a-13: bi si ma da n'a ga sha r'i ram zhes
T02D2676:141a-14: bya ba ni dug gis myos pa'i klu'i lus po
T02D2676:141a-15: de bzhin du choms shig pa'o //
T02D2676:141a-16: gzhan yang bi sphot ya zhes bya ba ni gzi
T02D2676:141a-17: brjid kyis 'joms par mdzod cig ces bskul ba'i tshig
T02D2676:141a-18: go // 'joms par bya ba de gang zhe na /
T02D2676:141a-19: n'a ga n'a ya n'a ni zhes bya ba smos te klu'i mig rnams so //
T02D2676:141a-20: sngags kyi mthu gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2676:141a-21: tadya th'a zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2676:141a-22: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyi sku phyag na rdo rje la bskul ba bstan te /
T02D2676:141a-23: h'um phat ces smos te phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi thugs bskul ba'o //
T02D2676:141a-25: n'a ga bi d'a ra n'a ya h'um phat ces bya ba smos te /
T02D2676:141a-26: kye klu rnams 'joms par byed pa /
T02D2676:141a-27: klu rnams rlag par byed pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig sbyar ro //
T02D2676:141a-28: h'um gi sgra ni thugs bskul ba'o //
T02D2676:141a-29: phat ces bya bas gdug pa nyams par gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2676:141a-30: n'a got+s'ad n'a ya phat ces bya ba ni shin tu gdug pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2676:141a-31: gal te dug gis zin pa mi gtong na de'i
T02D2676:141a-32: tshe bskrad par mdzad nas yi ge phat kyis rengs
T02D2676:141a-33: par mdzod cig ces bskul ba'o //
T02D2676:141a-34: n'i l'amba sa na ya phat ces bya bas ni
T02D2676:141a-35: mngon spyod kyi las dang rjes su mthun pa'i gos
T02D2676:141a-36: sngon po gnas pa khyod yin pas /
T02D2676:141a-37: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i las mdzod cig pa'o zhes bskul ba'o //
T02D2676:141a-38: las de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2676:141a-39: phat ces bya ba smos pa la du ma bu dum bur gyis shig pa'o //
T02D2676:141a-40: aa pra ti ha ta ba lab r'a kra ma
T02D2676:141a-41: ya phat ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir khyod
T02D2676:141a-42: kyi stobs dang mthu la gzhan gyis mi thub pas
T02D2676:141a-43: de'i phyir phat ces bya ba ni khyod kyis dgra
T02D2676:141a-44: nyams par gyis shig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2676:141b-0: krit'anta @141b ya phat ces bya ba la /
T02D2676:141b-1: bgegs mthar byed pa'i gzugs can phyag na rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal nas /
T02D2676:141b-2: phat kyi sngags kyis bgegs gdug ba nyams par gyis shig ces bskul ba'o //
T02D2676:141b-3: krit'anta r'u p'a ya phat ces pa ni gshin rje'i gzugs can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2676:141b-4: phat ces bya ba ni mngon spyod las la sbyor ba'o //
T02D2676:141b-5: ro sha n'a ya phat ces bya ba la /
T02D2676:141b-6: khro bo'i cha lugs can yin gyi khro bo'i rang
T02D2676:141b-7: bzhin ma yin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
T02D2676:141b-8: dgongs pa'o // t'a sa n'a ya phat ces bya ba la /
T02D2676:141b-9: mthong ba tsam gyis gdug pa skrag par byed pa khyod la yin zhes bstan pa'o ;
T02D2676:141b-10: / phyag thams cad du dbye ba'i tshig bzhi pa shes par bya'o //
T02D2676:141b-11: na ma:svasti sva h'a s'a dha aa la m'a shat
T02D2676:141b-12: yo ge tsa tve rthi zhes sgra'i mdo las 'byung
T02D2676:141b-13: bas so // kusma nto tsh'a da n'a ya phat
T02D2676:141b-14: ces bya ba ni kusmanta ni yi dags kyi khyad
T02D2676:141b-15: bas so // par te / dmu chu dang dri'u skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D2676:141b-16: de rnams skrag par byed pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2676:141b-18: des byas pa'i skyon phrol cig pa'o //
T02D2676:141b-19: pre ta pi sh'a tsa bi n'a sha ka r'a
T02D2676:141b-20: ya phat ces bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul dang mthu
T02D2676:141b-21: yod pa'i yi dags gang yin pa dang /
T02D2676:141b-22: de bzhin du sha za ni mi'i sha la dga' ba'o //
T02D2676:141b-23: de rnams nyams par byed cing rdzu 'phrul dang stobs
T02D2676:141b-24: dang brtson 'grus 'joms par byed pa phyag na rdo
T02D2676:141b-25: rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig lhag ma
T02D2676:141b-26: sbyar pa'o // phat ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2676:141b-27: yaksha aa pasm'a ra bi n'a sha k'a r'a ya
T02D2676:141b-28: phat zhes bya ba la 'dres byas pa'i skyon gyi
T02D2676:141b-29: rtags ni mi gtsang ba za ba dang /
T02D2676:141b-30: kha zas lhag par za ba dang /
T02D2676:141b-32: thal lcag dang dbyug pa dang /
T02D2676:141b-33: rkang pa gzhan la brdegs pa dang /
T02D2676:141b-34: nga ro 'jigs pa sgrogs pa dang /
T02D2676:141b-35: de la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'gyur ba rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi rtags su shes par bya'o //
T02D2676:141b-36: de bzhin du yang brjed byed kyi rtags su dran pa nyams pa dang /
T02D2676:141b-40: me dang chu dang g-yang la mchod pa dang /
T02D2676:141b-41: gnyid mang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T02D2676:142a-0: skyon de rnams dran pa tsam gyis 'joms par byed pa @142a * //
T02D2676:142a-1: khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig lhag ma dang sbyar ro //
T02D2676:142a-2: phat ces bya ba ni thar bar gyis shig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2676:142a-3: ha sa ha sa zhes bya ba ni bzhad pa tsam gyis so //
T02D2676:142a-4: dha ra dha ra zhes bya ba ni dran pa tsam gyis so //
T02D2676:142a-5: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya zhes bya ba ni
T02D2676:142a-6: gdug pa'i sems can gyi bsam pa gdug pa med
T02D2676:142a-7: par gyis shig ces dgongs pa'o //
T02D2676:142a-8: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya zhes bya ba ni
T02D2676:142a-9: ltas ngan la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa bzlog par gyis
T02D2676:142a-11: sarba bighnan bi n'a sha ka r'a ya h'um phat
T02D2676:142a-12: ces bya ba ni chos dang nor 'dod pa'i bar
T02D2676:142a-14: khyod kyi gzugs sngags bklags pa tsam gyis de rnams
T02D2676:142a-15: 'joms par byed pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
T02D2676:142a-17: phat ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du bskul pa'o //
T02D2676:142a-18: sarba sha tr'um sam gha bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat ces bya ba la /
T02D2676:142a-19: pha rol po mu stegs dang so so'i skye bo dang ;
T02D2676:142a-20: dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa ni bgegs kyi tshogs so //
T02D2676:142a-21: de rnams kyis byas pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang /
T02D2676:142a-22: ngan sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad khyod kyi gzungs
T02D2676:142a-23: sngags brjod pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyur
T02D2676:142a-24: ba de bas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig
T02D2676:142a-26: phat ces snga ma bzhin bskul lo //
T02D2676:142a-27: n'i l'abma ra dha ra badzra p'a ni r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D2676:142a-28: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa pos phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la /
T02D2676:142a-29: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' bsgo bar bya'o zhes dgongs so //
T02D2676:142a-30: sv'a h'a zhes pa ni gsang sngags kyi sku de nye bar sdud pa bstan to //
T02D2676:142a-31: gzungs sngags kyi sbyor ba'i nus pa ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D2676:142a-32: gos sngon phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02D2676:142a-34: dge ba cung zad gang thob pa //
T02D2676:142a-35: de yis 'gro kun nad med shog //
T02D2676:142a-36: dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi 'grel pa /
